eventDecorators.name: Cancel campaign
eventDecorators.description: Emittd when the campaign is successfuly cancelled by the campaign owner.

parameterDecorators.name: Campaign owner
parameterDecorators.description: Campaign owner wallet.

parameterDecorators.name: Token for sale
parameterDecorators.description: Contract address of the token being sold before the campaign was canceled.

parameterDecorators.name: Returned supply
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of the tokens returned to the campaign owner once the campaign is canceled by the owner.

parameterDecorators.name: Timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: Point in time when the event was emitted.

eventDecorators.name: Cancel investment
eventDecorators.description: Emitted for active campaigns only, when one of existing investors cancels their investment.

parameterDecorators.name: Investor
parameterDecorators.description: Wallet address of the investor who canceled their investment.

parameterDecorators.name: Token for sale
parameterDecorators.description: Contract address of the token being sold before the campaign was canceled.

parameterDecorators.name: Returned supply
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of the tokens returned to the campaign owner once the campaign is canceled by the owner.

parameterDecorators.name: Timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: Point in time when the event was emitted.

eventDecorators.name: Change ownership
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the campaign owner is changed to a new address.

parameterDecorators.name: Caller
parameterDecorators.description: Wallet address of the old owner who initiated the ownership change

parameterDecorators.name: New owner
parameterDecorators.description: Wallet address of the newly selected owner

parameterDecorators.name: Timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: Point in time when the event was emitted.

eventDecorators.name: Claim tokens
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when any of the investors claim their tokens after the campaign has been close successfully.

parameterDecorators.name: Investor
parameterDecorators.description: Wallet address of the investor who claimed their investment tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: Token for sale
parameterDecorators.description: Contract address of the token being claimed.

parameterDecorators.name: Token amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of the tokens claimed by the investor.

parameterDecorators.name: Token value
parameterDecorators.description: Value of the tokens claimed by the investor, denominated in the payment token configured on the campaign.

parameterDecorators.name: Timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: Point in time when the event was emitted.

eventDecorators.name: Finalize campaign
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the campaign owner closes campaign successfully.

parameterDecorators.name: Investor
parameterDecorators.description: Wallet address of the investor who claimed their investment tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: Token for sale
parameterDecorators.description: Contract address of the token being claimed.

parameterDecorators.name: Token amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of the tokens claimed by the investor.

parameterDecorators.name: Token value
parameterDecorators.description: Value of the tokens claimed by the investor, denominated in the payment token configured on the campaign.

parameterDecorators.name: Timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: Point in time when the event was emitted.
